name: Lumium
description:
Lumium is about choosing the right ‘jump’. Sounds easy? Maybe not so fast. Floor Tiles come and go fast- and in a matter of split seconds- you have to decide whether to jump or double jump.

And just don't tap or double tap. To jump you have to press the left side of the screen. And for a double jump, right. Sounds intuitive? Yes, we designed Lumium as a brain teaser arcade. Lumium also has a hint of a puzzle.



Features:

Uniquely designed Arcade levels!
Minimal and aesthetic visual design
Relaxing Music.
Game Center integrated with leaderboard and achievements.
Exclusive for iOS.

We optimised Lumium for iPhone and iPad.

Enjoy!
